name: Southern Baked Beans
instructions: Brown and drain bacon, hamburger & onion.
Mix meat mixture with next four ingredients.
Add all cans of beans (use one pound cans and drain all except for butter beans).
Bake slowly or put in crock-pot for 4 hours.
MARY BOWMAN’S CORN ON THE COB
Freshly picked Corn from Eddies’ Garden
Peel apples, cut apples around core, cut apples into one inch chunks.
Combine apples, water and lemon juice into a pan.
Heat to boiling over medium heat.  Simmer uncovered stirring occasionally to break up apples, until tender – 5 to 10 min.
Mix nutmeg, cinnamon and sugar together.  Put in pan together.  Use low to medium heat.
Heat to a boil.  Cook for 1 minute until desired texture.
Cut off all but 2” of beet tops.
Wash beets and leave whole with root ends attached.
Heat 6 cups water, 1 tbsp. Vinegar (to preserve color) and 1 tsp. Salt.

Cover – heat to boil.  Reduce to medium boil until tender - 40 to 50 minutes; drain, run cold water over beets, slip off skins and remove root ends.  Slice.  Serve warm with butter, or cold with vinegar.
